name: 4K Ultra HD Smart TV
description: A 55-inch 4K Ultra HD Smart TV with built-in streaming apps.
detailedDescription: This 55-inch 4K Ultra HD Smart TV offers stunning picture quality with HDR support. It comes with built-in apps for Netflix, Hulu, and YouTube, making streaming easy and convenient. It also supports voice commands via Alexa or Google Assistant.

name: Wireless Noise Cancelling Headphones
description: Over-ear wireless headphones with noise-cancelling technology.
detailedDescription: These wireless over-ear headphones come equipped with industry-leading noise-cancelling technology. With up to 30 hours of battery life, they are perfect for long flights or daily commutes. Enjoy high-resolution audio with deep bass and crystal-clear highs.

name: Gaming Laptop
description: A powerful gaming laptop with high-end graphics and fast processor.
detailedDescription: This gaming laptop features a powerful Intel i7 processor, 16GB of RAM, and an NVIDIA GTX 3060 graphics card. It has a 144Hz display for smooth gameplay and comes with 1TB of SSD storage, making it ideal for gaming enthusiasts.

name: Bluetooth Soundbar
description: A Bluetooth soundbar with surround sound capabilities.
detailedDescription: Upgrade your home audio system with this Bluetooth soundbar, featuring surround sound technology. It connects wirelessly to your devices, making it easy to stream music, TV shows, or movies in stunning audio quality.

name: Smartphone
description: A high-end smartphone with 128GB storage and 5G capabilities.
detailedDescription: This smartphone comes with a 6.5-inch AMOLED display, 128GB of storage, and a fast 5G connection. It includes a triple-camera system, offering stunning photos and 4K video recording. With a long-lasting battery and wireless charging, it keeps you connected all day.

name: Smartwatch
description: A feature-rich smartwatch with fitness tracking and notifications.
detailedDescription: Stay on top of your health with this smartwatch, which includes fitness tracking, heart rate monitoring, and sleep analysis. It also provides notifications for calls, texts, and apps directly to your wrist. Water-resistant and compatible with both Android and iOS.

name: Tablet
description: A 10-inch tablet with a high-resolution display and 64GB storage.
detailedDescription: This 10-inch tablet offers a high-resolution display for watching movies, reading eBooks, or browsing the web. It has 64GB of internal storage, expandable with a microSD card, and is perfect for both entertainment and productivity on the go.

name: 4K Action Camera
description: A compact 4K action camera with waterproof housing.
detailedDescription: Capture your adventures in stunning 4K with this compact action camera. It includes a waterproof housing, making it ideal for underwater shots. With image stabilization and a wide-angle lens, you'll be able to record all your action-packed moments.

name: Bluetooth Portable Speaker
description: A portable Bluetooth speaker with excellent sound quality.
detailedDescription: Take your music on the go with this Bluetooth portable speaker. It delivers excellent sound quality, deep bass, and has a 10-hour battery life. The water-resistant design makes it perfect for outdoor adventures.

name: Drone with Camera
description: A drone with a 4K camera and GPS stabilization.
detailedDescription: This drone is equipped with a 4K camera, GPS stabilization, and intelligent flight modes. Capture stunning aerial footage and control the drone easily using your smartphone or included controller. Perfect for both beginners and experienced pilots.

name: Desktop Computer
description: A powerful desktop computer with 16GB RAM and 1TB SSD.
detailedDescription: This desktop computer is built for performance, featuring a fast Intel i7 processor, 16GB of RAM, and a 1TB SSD for storage. Ideal for gaming, video editing, or heavy multitasking, it provides all the power you need for work or play.

name: USB-C Charging Cable
description: A fast-charging USB-C cable for all your devices.
detailedDescription: This USB-C charging cable supports fast charging and data transfer for your devices. Its durable design ensures it will last through heavy use, making it an essential accessory for smartphones, tablets, and laptops.

name: Gaming Mouse
description: A high-precision gaming mouse with customizable buttons.
detailedDescription: This gaming mouse features high precision tracking and customizable buttons, allowing you to set up your ideal gaming configuration. With RGB lighting and a comfortable ergonomic design, it enhances your gaming experience.

name: Smart Home Assistant
description: A voice-activated smart home assistant that controls your devices.
detailedDescription: This voice-activated smart home assistant helps control your smart devices, stream music, set reminders, and much more. It integrates with popular platforms like Google Home, Alexa, and Apple HomeKit. Manage lights, thermostats, and other devices hands-free.

name: Electric Scooter
description: An electric scooter with a 15-mile range and fast charging.
detailedDescription: This electric scooter offers a top speed of 15 mph and a range of 15 miles on a single charge. With a foldable design for easy storage and fast charging capabilities, it's perfect for short commutes or leisurely rides.
